The Form Builder portlet is packaged in the _formgenerator.war_ file. It allows users to create node types and document templates for node types.
h1. Available preferences {anchor:id=CONTref.Portlets.FormBuilder.AvailablePreferences}

|| *Preference* || *Type*|| *Default Value* || *Description* ||
| *repository* | {{String}} | {{repository}} | The current repository name which is always "repository". |

h1. Sample Configuration {anchor:id=CONTref.Portlets.FormBuilder.SampleConfiguration}

{code:xml}
<portlet-preferences>
  <preference>
    <name>repository</name>
    <value>repository</value>
    <read-only>false</read-only>
  </preference>
</portlet-preferences>    
{code}
